sentence.text: Two cases of high serum clozapine concentrations occurring during inflammation in Chinese patients.
Objective Serious infections or inflammations have been associated with serum clozapine concentration increases and sometimes with clozapine toxicity
Method These two cases describe Chinese patients (Case 1: a 57-year-old female nonsmoker with severe dermatitis and Case 2: a 47-year-old male nonsmoker with influenza and secondary infection)
Results In both cases, the Drug Interaction Probability Scale established the presence of a probable drug-drug interaction
